默默無聞.en: obscure and unknown (idiom); an outsider without any reputation, a nobody, an unknown quantity

齊眉.en: mutual respect in marriage, abbr. of idiom 舉案齊眉|举案齐眉[ju3 an4 qi2 mei2]

龐德.en: Pang De (-219), general of Cao Wei at the start of the Three Kingdoms period, victor over Guan Yu 關羽|关羽, Pound (name), Ezra Pound (1885-1972), American poet and translator
